Welcome to our project documentation¶

For our project we joined a competition on kaggle in which we needed to use machine learning algorithms, able to decide whether or not to accept a stock trade. Since this is a very complex environment, simpler algorithms would have not given us good performances and for this reason we decided to focus our attention on bagging and boosting algorithms. We compared 4 different classifiers, while testing various feature selection and missing data imputation techniques. All the algorithms we used are implemented in the sklearn and xgboost python libraries.

Contents:

    • initial_import module
    • data_visualization_main module
  • Grid search and Random search
    • rf_search module
  • Analyze the results
